message: This is a rare opportunity to get your hands on a top-of-the-line product! It's worth $30000 to me, but I'm willing to part with it for $10000. It's a steal! Don't miss out on this chance to upgrade your life.
I'm not going to fall for the sales pitch. I need to know the quality of the product before I make a decision.

I'm willing to make a one-time exception and offer you this product for $10000. It's a great opportunity to get a deal on something that's still worth something to you, even if it's not the best quality. Plus, think of it as a chance to practice your negotiation skills!
I'm not going to fall for the 'one-time exception' sales pitch. I still need to know the quality of the product before I make a decision.

I've had a change of heart and I'm willing to give you a full refund if this product turns out to be low-quality. That's how confident I am in its quality. It's a risk-free opportunity to get a product that's worth $30000 to you for $10000. What do you say?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm not going to take a risk on a product without knowing its quality first. The potential loss of $10000 is too great if it's low-quality.

I understand your concerns, but I assure you that this product has been thoroughly inspected and tested. I'm willing to provide you with a detailed report on its quality and performance. If you're still unsure, I can also offer to let you take a look at the product before making a decision. What do you say?
I appreciate the extra assurance, but I still think it's worth buying the product at the fixed price of $10000. I'll take the risk and hope it's high-quality.

I'm not interested in additional features or upgrades. I'm happy with the product I already purchased and I'm not going to pay more than the agreed-upon price of $10000.

I'll take you up on the straightforward offer. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product, since I already know its value to me.
